name: UFO: Incursion
short_description: UFO-Incursion is a game that is reminiscent of the original X-Com series. It is our intent to create a game that far surpasses the original’s… Indeed this game is not a clone of the original(s), but it is inspired by these wonderful games. It is not our intent to rip off the original team of amazing designers so we are going to rebuild the game from the ground up, this will give us the same style of game but with a fresh feel and powerful engines. It is our goal to recreate the immersive atmosphere the original X-Com games had. It is our intention to create not only a visually stunning game but also an emotionally immersive atmosphere.
